job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Linux Systems Engineer (On-Premise and Cloud)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters, including our AWS cloud platforms.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide.
     * Manage & Support our Cloud Infrastructure to:
     * Design, deploy (via Terraform), and manage AWS cloud infrastructure components (EC2 instances, VPC, EKS, S3, EFS, etc.).
     * Optimize cloud resources for cost efficiency and performance.
     * Monitor and maintain high availability and fault tolerance of cloud services.
     * Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Linux Systems Engineer (On-Premise and Cloud)

* You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters, including our AWS cloud platforms.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide.
     * Manage & Support our Cloud Infrastructure to:
     * Design, deploy (via Terraform), and manage AWS cloud infrastructure components (EC2 instances, VPC, EKS, S3, EFS, etc.).
     * Optimize cloud resources for cost efficiency and performance.
     * Monitor and maintain high availability and fault tolerance of cloud services.
     * Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional systems engineering, infrastructure management, and cloud operations (AWS, Linux, Terraform, EKS, EC2, VPC, S3, EFS). While it mentions a 'DevOps mindset' and 'automation tooling', it does not involve the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of AI/ML models, nor does it focus on generative AI technologies. The core responsibilities are centered around maintaining and improving IT infrastructure rather than building AI-powered applications or models, making it a non-AI technical role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes managing and improving automation tooling, participating in on-call rotations, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance, and working with a DevOps mindset to provide flexible infrastructure. These are core aspects of operations engineering, even if not specifically AI-focused MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Operate and improve our automation tooling

job_tasks.justification: Managing and supporting cloud infrastructure, including design, deployment, optimization, monitoring, and maintenance of high availability and fault tolerance, aligns with operations engineering principles, particularly in a cloud context.

Designing, deploying (via Terraform), and managing cloud infrastructure components like EC2, VPC, EKS, S3, EFS are software development tasks related to infrastructure as code and cloud service management.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, deploy (via Terraform), and manage AWS cloud infrastructure components (EC2 instances, VPC, EKS, S3, EFS, etc.)

job_tasks.justification: The goal of achieving high uptime (>99.99%) and providing flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company demonstrates an understanding of business needs and how infrastructure supports them.
Understanding a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customization is crucial for aligning infrastructure with business requirements and ensuring effective operations.
job_tasks.phrase: Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation

job_tasks.justification: Working with a DevOps mindset to bring products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide indicates a focus on business objectives and customer delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide

soft_skills.phrase: Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company
Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters, including our AWS cloud platforms.
Optimize cloud resources for cost efficiency and performance.
Operate and improve our automation tooling.
Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.
